text: Arfa may refer to the following people ;Given name *Arfa Siddiq (born 1987), Pakistani politician and leader of the Pashtun Tahafuz Movement *Arfa Karim (1995–2012), Pakistani computer programmer **Arfa Software Technology Park named after Arfa Karim ;Surname *Hasan Arfa (1895–1984), Iranian general and ambassador *Hatem Ben Arfa (born 1987), French football player *Abu'l Hasan ibn Arfa Ra'a (died 1197), Muslim chemist
title: Arfa (name)
